title: Validate SSL Decrypt policy "Access method" and "OS family" works for  "Decrypt" action and apply change save correctly
custom_steps:
- Login to tenant and go to Policies -> SSL Decryption policy
- click on "New Policy"
- In Match Criteria -> click on Add Criteria
- Select OS Family and few values (such as Windows) AND Select Access method and few values (such as Client, GRE)
- Selctt action as "Decrypt"
- add policy name, save policy and apply change
custom_expected:
- Ensure checkbox for all Access method and OS Family values are selectable
- there should be no issues with save policy
- Policy table should show new policy configured correctly
